reviews.text: Wonderful experience great food and drinks.

Ordered the wings, I would have preferred the dry seasoning, ordered the lemon pepper, and mild wings. The French fries were great, shoestring and hot when brought to the table, also drinks were perfect üëå

Hours open &close website are confusing
Cozy comfortable place to just chill in. Come if you want to kill some time with people.
Great staff and food is delicious, try the shepherds pie and steak tips.
Nice bar with TV'S, and locals capture some of the daily sport actions there
Great food, great staff. A must for anyone in the neighborhood.
love the place and very nice people
1st time there. Food was great the Bartender was attentive, friendly and professional.  Very clean environment!
Local bar with awesome beer & wings, always a great time with friends and random people.
Amazing!!
Great place love it atmosphere.People waitress great alcohol.Great game scrape bathroom out of is a way.I don't have to come back to my neighborhood on the corner.Perfect lots of food on the menu

Really? 12/23/24. I came here to watch the green packer game and it was taken off at the last minute. Fine.. then I was playing  music  but the bartender decided that watching Willy Wonka was more important than my money being spent in the‚Ä¶
The cheeseburgers are so good, very friendly people just short of help
Great spot! The burgers are amazing!

This is my favorite spot in the neighborhood. It's got that cozy pub feel, tasty food and a great place to grab a drink, catch up with friends, or celebrate with family. We stop by for most family birthdays and occasions. We even held my mom's 60th birthday in the back room and had the whole thing catered for super reasonable cost. We held a paint and sip back there. The food is super tasty. I'm obsessed with the garlic mushrooms and I spent most of my life thinking I didn't like mushrooms! The steak tidbits are mouth watering. There are always interesting locals seated at the bar and happy groups seated around the tables. It's a great atmosphere. Owner and staff are friendly and warm.
This is a pretty cool local bar. It's got a cozy vibe, especially in the winter because of the dark wood inside.
Wry nice
Food was bad. But then again, I got penne al vodka with chicken from an Irish pub, so that‚Äôs my fault. But overall good staff, good vibes. I usually stick to steak fries from here :)
Ordered delivery through grub hub and it arrived super quickly.
Great bar near the airport
A perfect place to visit and grab some beers with your friends. The music and the service are outstanding!

We dropped in for some food with friends the atmosphere was very friendly as we were on holidays from Ireland üáÆüá™ mary was full of chat about where we were from. We went back to cassidy's with our friends before we flew home a great evening
Pintu was an amazing Bartender great service
I was here a few weeks ago and I back tonight, the hot wings, nachos Supreme and cold beers deserved five stars. Cheers
Great late night vibes and solid service.
Overpriced mediocre food and place does not smell clean. The wait staff has always been nice though.
Average place
Nice small restaurant and bar. Friendly staffs.
Great wings, delicious sliders. Mary is the best. Love this place.
Nice neighborhood bar with some interesting regulars. The food is pretty good and the bartenders are great. I always have a fun time here.
Best home style bar with the best wings ever . Try it . If you dont like it . Lmk
Excelente lugar!!

Stop in for light fare was impressed with its full menu. We had breaded mushrooms. Chili cheese fries.   Rubin sliders and steak tidbits. All delicious fresh. Prices were great service  excellent    It‚Äôs night fir dining but great neighborhood pub   Really enjoyed

Long story short I had to go from JFK to LGA on a long layover to get home and this was the latest place next to the airport open to wait until my 5am flight.
We had a couple of drinks, shared a Bacon Cheeseburger with Onion Rings and Cheese Fries and it was fine. Nothing was to rave about as the drinks and food were just fine. The burger was just a bit dry and the fries were lacking a bit of flavor besides the bacon. The onion rings were really good though, perfectly fried and didn't have a bad oily flavor. The drinks were ok as well, I had an Old Fashioned that was good but it had just a little too much bitters. Our bartender was really nice, he chatted with us as we sat at the bar - mostly because there was nothing else to do since there were only two other people in the bar!
All in all, it was a typical bar. It didn't necessarily stand out but it wasn't a bad restaurant either.
Amazing wings... great service üëè üëç üëå‚Ä¶

Love going to the Stable Mates....umm I mean Cassidy's Ale House.  The wings were amazing as usual, and our get together with my childhood buddies was just right in the perfect atmosphere Cassidy's provided.  The bartender was very‚Ä¶
Great little Irish pub, everyone is old school. The steak tips are great with a Cesar salad. Ask for a hot toddy, she makes them perfect...

Awesome wings! You can get sauces on the side if your party likes different spice levels like ours does. They have honey bbq (no heat) to nuclear (most heat) so everyone is covered in the spicy range!  Drinks are very good! Good variety of‚Ä¶
CASSIDYS... An AWESOME NEIGHBORHOOD PUB  ... THE OWNER ANNIE & STAFF ARE OUTSTANDING... GREAT MENU...DRINKS & ALL ... LIVE, LOVE, LAUGH  ‚ô•
Great bar. Staff is excellent. And as advertised, the wings are INCREDIBLE. The medium wing sauce is something special.
Lindo lugar para relajarse muy bueno en comida.
Servers were very discriminatory. The bar otherwise is great.
Awesome service great food
I hope no one ever finds out the big secret here: THE. BEST. CHICKEN. WINGS. ANYWHERE.  Ask for them well done & hot!
Nice local pub , go food and atmosphere.
There for birthday party and food and atmosphere was amazing

I definitely recommend this place. My brother invited me and my sister to eat some wings. We spent a good time and now since my brother passed away me and my sister still go there and remember the good times‚Ä¶Definitely come by for the wings they are the best haha !
Great wings. Beer selection is wonderful. Bartenders make some great cocktails. The environment is homey and welcoming. Definitely a recommended neighborhood watering hole.
The place is amazing, I love it. Every single thing that I tried here is delicious. Service is excellent and the atmosphere is great
My first time  and i had a fantastic time. A friend was the one who set it up for friends to come together and celebrate early Christmas üéÑ‚Ä¶
Good local spot to watch the sports and drink beer. Clean place.attentive friendly staff

Best wings. Cassidy's is the best hole in the wall I have ever been to.  The food is so good and well priced. They just renovated so I don't know if I can even call it a hole in the wall anymore.  It was very nice being there. I was happy‚Ä¶

LOVE THIS PLACE.  Great old time pub atmosphere.  The drinks and food are both good quality and very reasonably priced.  Danny the waiter is amazing, almost like a personal assistant, he always has his eye out for your needs and always gets‚Ä¶

The food is tasty, but the take out sizes are horribly small for the amount you pay. French onion soup should be a larger size. $7 for half cup size, is crazy. Half cup....that is only 4 ounces. I  will not order from there again. Sizes are dreadfully small.
Been coming here for 20 years, great food and fun always. Only bad time is when my sports team looses a game lol. The wings are worth the trip. The owner and staff care about you.
Good place with good variety of drinks and good food. People really kind, music not that loud so you can have a good conversation or even play a game without yelling.‚Ä¶

Been here a number of times (have family in the area), and never had issues, but was denied service today because I didn't have my fascist papers on me at the time (phone was dead and I leave the paper passport at home). To the quisling‚Ä¶

Bits & Pieces original coustomer. The area has changed, lower end class people. Not like years ago... The food is all frozen nothing home made. Still owned bye cops. Years ago the cops that went to the bar were more relaxed not like today.‚Ä¶
Nice neighborhood bar.  The food is consistently good!   However, I find the drinks & food a tad bit pricier then I would like.  Otherwise, I would go there more frequently.

Most of the time customers get ignored. And some of the eomploye create uncomfortable situation. I wish there a good manager. I don‚Äôt like to be specific about my problems with restaurant but I will because I will be checking for more time.
It has a good food, service and drinks!!!. It isn't expensive.
I've been coming here for 11yrs there food menu is outstanding nice family bar. I ordered the Garlic tilapia with white creamy garlic sauce with spinach n mash potatoes.
Neighborhood bar. You can have lunch great appetizer. The owner Annie is super nice.  Was  Saturday night hang out for over 20 years

Bartenders and waitresses are liars on specific price of things. You'll say a drink was one price and the waitress will make sure she speaks to the bartender in private before you ask the bartender that way he'll just say the price she the‚Ä¶
Great place,  great food,  cozy environment... Could use a few updates,  but really nice neighborhood Irish bar.  Would pick this place a hundred times over those franchise sports bars.
Great ambient. Great service. Great food. Oozes a familiar warmth and the staff majes sure you have a good experience. Great to go with anyone and have a good time.
You wanna talk about some kick ass wings?!. The food and family like atmosphere will have ya coming back... great place and awesome bartenders.
